page.title: 08Trade
page.content: Most people use the local shops about once or twice a week for food shopping,non-food shopping,a service or take-away hot food. People tend to go to central London, Lewisham,Eltham Bexleyheath or Woolwich for clothing and shoes etc. There are a few big supermarkets in the area such as Safeways at Blackfen, and Tesco in Welling.Several other big shops are found in Welling High Street, like RACS Superstore,Texas Homecare,and Woolworths.Woolworths gets about 5000 shoppers each day and it has about 20 staff.It opens from 8.30am to 5.30pm.
